svg.title: Enhanced Galaxia — Advanced Spaceship shooting a GitHub-style commit grid
svg.desc: An enhanced retro spaceship with thruster effects moves smoothly along the bottom and fires projectiles with trails at selected green cells in a 7×53 grid. Hit cells fade out with ripple effects, stars twinkle, and the HUD displays animated information.

g.text: MISSION: DEPLOY ENERGY WEAPONS • TARGET: GITHUB GRID
